0.1.0.name: connect20/lr_callprice

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

0.1.1.name: connect20/lr_callprice
0.1.1.description: This extension hides the price and the add to cart button for specific products and replaces it with a Call For Price Button. This feature is applied to Product Details page , Product List page (Categroy page),Search result page.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
